eventDecorators.name: LogOracleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: AddressAuthorized
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: AuthorizedAddressRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: UpgradeRegistered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

functionDecorators.name: addAuthorizedAddress
functionDecorators.description: Add authorized address to contract. Can only be set by owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _authTarget
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new authorized contract.

functionDecorators.name: removeAuthorizedAddress
functionDecorators.description: Remove authorized address from contract. Can only be set by owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

functionDecorators.name: setTimeLockPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Change timeLockPeriod period. Generally called after initially settings have been set up.

parameterDecorators.name: _timeLockPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: Time in seconds that upgrades need to be evaluated before execution.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
